title: Act 1953 (No. 26 of 1953)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947), hereby
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Infectious Diseases (EU Digital
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Infectious Diseases (EU Digital 

Covid Certificates)(Revocation) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited infectious disease (eu digital covid certificates)(revocation) regulation 2022

title: Act 1953 (No. 26 of 1953)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947), hereby
heading: 2. The Infectious Diseases (EU Digital Covid Certificates) Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Infectious Diseases (EU Digital Covid Certificates) Regulations 

2022 (S.I. No. 189 of 2022) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 May, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th May, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [239] 3
text_norm: 2 infectious disease (eu digital covid certificates) regulation 2022 (s.i no 189 2022) revoked given official seal 18 may 2022 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 20th may 2022 239 3

title: Act 1953 (No. 26 of 1953)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations made under sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the 
Health Act 1953 (No. 26 of 1953)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) 
serve to revoke S.I. No. 189 of 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [239]
